main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a bright, self-luminous object moving straight and level before it descended and disappeared.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 7 minutes and occurred on a clear night with good visibility.,The object was described as bright and self-luminous, with characteristics resembling quartz.,The observer used binoculars to make the sighting objective., The sighting took place in Grand Rapids, Michigan, in 1956.,The report was part of Project Blue Book records.
